titles.title: To All The Nations (easy familiar tune nice)

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}To all the nations This is God's command Go and preach the gospel Throughout every land{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}To all the nations This is God's command Go and preach the gospel Throughout every land Christ who died on Calv'ry Bids us go today And He lives in heaven For His church to pray{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}To all the nations Preaching Christ abroad As the Lord and Savior Spotless Lamb of God Let us bear our witness Confident and clear With the Spirit's boldness We need never fear{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}To all the nations In the Spirit's power For the foes of darkness Challenge every hour But the Lord has promised That His Church shall be Built in every nation Glorious and free{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}To all the nations Till our Lord appear All the signs around us Signal He is near Christ will come in power His great glory show Then the earth in splendor Will His freedom know{/lang-eng}
